projects.title: AI Timetable Generator
projects.description: Built a full-stack, conflict-free Timetable Generator using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, featuring secure login, creation/editing capabilities, history tracking, and intelligent scheduling logic that achieved 95% constraint satisfaction through alternate period allocation and balanced weekly distribution.

projects.title: Couse Recommendation using collaborative filtering
projects.description: Developed a full-stack Course Recommendation System using Flask, MySQL, and TensorFlow, integrating a trained collaborative filtering model (.h5) with real-time user data to deliver personalized top-5 suggestions with 90%+ training accuracy via neural embeddings and dynamic backend logic.

projects.title: Face Recognition System
projects.description: Built a real-time face recognition system with integrated emotion and age prediction using OpenCV, Keras, and PyAgenderâ€”leveraging deep learning models for live webcam analysis and annotated visual feedback in Python.

projects.title: E-commerce comparison website
projects.description: Created a product comparison web app using HTML, CSS, Flask, and MySQL, featuring category-based navigation and platform-wise price listings to enhance user decision-making with smart product recommendations.

projects.title: HR Dashboard
projects.description: HR analytics solution simulating typical HR metrics, demographics, and compensation trends. It features both summary dashboards and deep-dive employee records, powered by a synthetic dataset and enriched with calculated metrics

projects.title: Extracted chat UI
projects.description: A sleek web-based interface built to visualize and export WhatsApp chat data. It allows users to upload extracted chat files and generate well-formatted PDF transcripts of conversations.
